channel.title: dom - 标签 - 时间的朋友
channel.description: dom - 标签 - 时间的朋友

item.title: 判断是不是DOM元素
item.author: 作者
item.description: function isElement(obj: any) { try { // Using W3 DOM2 (works for FF, Opera and Chrome) return obj instanceof HTMLElement; } catch (e) { // Browsers not supporting W3 DOM2 don't have HTMLElement and // an exception is thrown and we end up here. Testing some // properties that all elements have (works on IE7) return ( typeof obj === 'object' && obj.nodeType === 1 && typeof obj.style === 'object'
